#  Changes

## 0.1.0

* Add dictdiffer [schemas#14](https://codeberg.org/funfedidev/schemas/issues/14)
* Add `funfedi_schema` package
* adjust ActivityPub object schema to support a variation of the mastodon object
* add a version of the activity pub object schema taken from [muck_out](https://bovine.codeberg.page/muck_out/)
* add direct link to schema
* add logo [schemas#3](https://codeberg.org/funfedidev/schemas/issues/3)
